entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
